com.samysadi.acs.utility

Class IpAddress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samysadi.acs.utility.IpAddress

  • public class IpAddress
extends Object
    An object to save Ip Address information.

    Ip addresses are saved in a long (8 bytes).

    Since:
    1.0
